text: But Pharaoh, seeing that the rain and the hail and the thunder had ceased, sinned again and became obstinate, both he and his servants.
During the night Abimelech went into action with all his soldiers and set up an ambush outside of Shechem in four companies.
and, after eating and drinking, he said: “Attend to that accursed woman and bury her; for she was the daughter of a king.”
These were the levitical family heads by their generations, chiefs who dwelt in Jerusalem.
Yes, our kings, our princes, our priests, and our ancestors have not kept your law; They paid no attention to your commandments and the warnings which you gave them.
and withdraw his rod from me, So that his terrors did not frighten me;
But the Pharisees said, “He drives out demons by the prince of demons.”
But they remained silent. They had been discussing among themselves on the way who was the greatest.
While he was still speaking, a cloud came and cast a shadow over them, and they became frightened when they entered the cloud.
They answered and said to him, “You were born totally in sin, and are you trying to teach us?” Then they threw him out.
Peter said to him, “Aeneas, Jesus Christ heals you. Get up and make your bed.” He got up at once.
